name: Ryuno-Ki
text:
@roytang
Pardon?

I meant: if you feel confident enough to get more eyeballs on your page, you can submit an URL to whimsical.club and ask for getting it listed there.

It's a curated list of websites that aim for unique designs that speak of one's personality.

So in line with what you wrote about in the zine.
